description:
At Blue-Fields Restoration Counseling Services, the specialization is in Faith-based/Christian counseling, as well as traditional counseling. In order to encourage change, a variety of methods are offered: Individual, Marriage, Couples/Family and Mental Health counseling for the following issues:

* Family Counseling
* Youth Counseling 
* Life problem-solving 
* Depression
* Addiction
* Fear
* Anger
* Grief
* Bereavement
* Pregnancy
* Post Divorce
* Financial
name: BLUE-FIELDS RESTORATION SERVICES
